work.work_subtitle: A collection of the most impactful projects, chosen to represent quality and dedication in every detail. Explore some of my best results.

projects.name: BrasilBarbearias - Barbershop Management SaaS
projects.description: Complete SaaS platform for barbershop management with full CRUD operations, JWT authentication, and Mercado Pago payment integration. Built with Next.js, TypeScript, Express, and Tailwind CSS. Features include user registration, secure login with bcrypt, toast notifications, and AWS EC2 deployment. Streamlines business operations and improves customer accessibility.

projects.name: Restaurant Platform
projects.description: Development of a comprehensive restaurant management platform with secure Stripe integration for payment processing, JWT authentication for secure login, and a robust admin dashboard. Built with modern technologies such as React, Vite, and Axios on the front end, and Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, and Prisma on the back end, ensuring high performance, security, and scalability.

projects.name: 31Hamburgueria
projects.description: Landing page developed for the 31Hamburguer restaurant using Vue.js and TailwindCSS. The page was designed with a focus on converting visitors into customers, presenting the menu clearly, highlighting promotions, and facilitating contact with the establishment. The layout was optimized for fast and intuitive navigation, ensuring an excellent user experience on mobile and desktop devices.

projects.name: Pet Management System
